pull.title: ci: Enable all functional tests in valgrind
pull.body: The travis timeout for our repo has been bumped to 2h, so we can run all tests in valgrind now

events.body: Concept ACK although I'd be surprised if two hours is enough -- but let's hope for the best! :)

events.body:
> Concept ACK although I'd be surprised if two hours is enough -- but let's hope for the best! :)

@practicalswift  All green now in less than two hours

@MarcoFalke Wow, that's great news :)

ACK 4444edc2e6671d3f73de3725447130f73ecf0375 -- regarding the three disabled cases (`feature_abortnode`, `feature_block` and `rpc_bind`): not a big deal since MSan will take care of those once #18288 is merged. More is more :)
